incident_location: Parking lot, 2325 Main Street, Springfield, OH 45503
incident_description: Vehicle legally parked in marked space. Gray pickup truck attempting to park beside struck the front end and driver's side of vehicle causing significant damage. Other driver left information and waited for police.
damage_description: Front bumper dislodged and partially detached; severe denting and scraping on driver's side front quarter panel; wheel and tire on driver's side front damaged; paint transfer and deformity on the driver's door; headlamp assembly and grille potentially damaged; possible hidden damage to mechanical components behind the bumper
claim_request: Full coverage of repair expenses minus deductible

incident_description: Driving eastbound through green light when another vehicle traveling southbound failed to stop at red signal and struck vehicle on driver's side. Car spun partially before stopping near curb. Other driver admitted fault to police.
damage_description: Heavy intrusion and bending on driver's front and rear doors; B-pillar area severely compromised; rear wheel misaligned, not functional for safe driving; shattered rear driver's side window; scraping and paint transfer along both driver's side doors and lower panels; deployment of side airbags; possible interior damage to armrests and door controls; vehicle towed from accident location
claim_request: Assessment and full coverage for extensive body and structural repairs

incident_description: Operating vehicle eastbound on East 8th Street, slowed to make left turn into residential driveway. Another vehicle traveling at excessive speed attempted to overtake on left and collided forcefully with rear driver's side quarter panel. Impact caused car to spin and strike nearby curb, resulting in further damage to front bumper and left front wheel. At-fault driver admitted fault to responding police officer.
damage_description: Major denting and scraping to rear driver's side quarter panel and bumper; damage to rear wheel arch; front bumper heavily crumpled and partially detached due to secondary curb impact; left front wheel and suspension suspected damaged; minor scraping to front left headlight housing; vehicle determined not drivable and towed for repair assessment
claim_request: Full assessment and repair of all damage to rear quarter panel, front bumper, and suspension

incident_description: Driving westbound on Westbrook Road, waiting in line with traffic for stop sign. Vehicle was rear-ended by blue sedan at moderate speed. Impact pushed vehicle into adjacent lane and forced front end into left lane's shoulder. Other driver remained at scene and called local authorities.
damage_description: Severe crumpling and structural damage to rear bumper and rear quarter panel; rear driver's side taillight broken and assembly displaced; rear hatch door bent and misaligned, unable to close properly; noticeable damage and scraping to rear fender and left rear wheel well; suspension may be compromised; rear wheel does not track properly; minor paint scrapes and denting along driver's side; trunk contents disturbed, possible interior damage
claim_request: Assessment and coverage for all rear-end bodywork and mechanical repairs, plus reimbursement for towing costs

incident_location: Intersection of Karl Road & Bethel Road, Columbus, OH 43214
incident_description: Driving eastbound on Bethel Road, entered intersection at Karl Road. Gray pickup truck traveling northbound failed to yield while making left turn and struck rear driver's side of vehicle. Force of impact spun car, causing extensive damage to left rear panel and bumper. Other driver remained at scene and called local police.
damage_description: Severe crumpling and denting of left rear quarter panel and bumper; rear driver's side taillight shattered; rear door and trunk slightly misaligned, trunk latch affected; rear wheel on driver's side bent, suspected axle damage; scrapes and paint transfer along left side; possible undercarriage and suspension issues; vehicle not safe to drive, towed from scene
claim_request: Full assessment and coverage for all necessary body, mechanical, and suspension repairs, plus reimbursement for towing costs
